Population count.label: Total population
Population count.subtitle: Mid-year estimate of the total number of people
Population count.longDescription: This indicator shows the mid-year estimate of the total population, in the United Kingdom, for 1991 to 2024.
Population count.caveats: Population estimates in Explore Local Statistics (ELS) are informed by those available on Nomis at the time of publication on ELS.

Population count - Female.label: Total female population
Population count - Female.subtitle: Mid-year estimate of the total number of females
Population count - Female.longDescription: This indicator shows the mid-year estimate of the total female population, in the United Kingdom, for 1991 to 2024.
Population count - Female.caveats: Population estimates in Explore Local Statistics (ELS) are informed by those available on Nomis at the time of publication on ELS.

Population count - Male.label: Total male population
Population count - Male.subtitle: Mid-year estimate of the total number of males
Population count - Male.longDescription: This indicator shows the mid-year estimate of the total male population, in the United Kingdom, for 1991 to 2024.
Population count - Male.caveats: Population estimates in Explore Local Statistics (ELS) are informed by those available on Nomis at the time of publication on ELS.

Median age.label: Median age
Median age.subtitle: Median age of people
Median age.longDescription: This indicator shows the median age of people, in the United Kingdom, for 1991 to 2024.
Median age.caveats:
Median age is calculated as the age category in which the mid-point of the population distribution falls. There may be slight differences when compared with other sources, as these may reflect where the mid-point falls within the given age category. These reflect differences in precision, not accuracy.

Population estimates in Explore Local Statistics (ELS) are informed by those available on Nomis at the time of publication on ELS.

Median age - Female.subtitle: Median age of the female population
Median age - Female.longDescription: This indicator shows the median age of the female population, in the United Kingdom, for 1991 to 2024.
Median age - Female.caveats:
Median age is calculated as the age category in which the mid-point of the population distribution falls. Population estimates in Explore Local Statistics (ELS) are informed by those available on Nomis at the time of publication on ELS.

Median age - Male.subtitle: Median age of the male population
Median age - Male.longDescription: This indicator shows the median age of the male population, in the United Kingdom, for 1991 to 2024.
Median age - Male.caveats:
Median age is calculated as the age category in which the mid-point of the population distribution falls. There may be slight differences when compared with other sources, as these may reflect where the mid-point falls within the given age category. These reflect differences in precision, not accuracy.

Population estimates in Explore Local Statistics (ELS) are informed by those available on Nomis at the time of publication on ELS.

Population density.label: Population density
Population density.subtitle: Number of people resident per square kilometre
Population density.longDescription: This indicator shows the number of usual residents per square kilometre, calculated based on total land area excluding inland water, in the United Kingdom, for 1991 to 2024.
Population density.caveats:
[Standard Area Measurements (December 2024) in the UK](https://geoportal.statistics.gov.uk/datasets/ons::standard-area-measurements-for-the-local-authority-districts-december-2024-in-the-united-kingdom/about) was used to calculate population density by dividing the total population by the area in square kilometres.

Population estimates in Explore Local Statistics (ELS) are informed by those available on Nomis at the time of publication on ELS.

Population density - Female.label: Female population density
Population density - Female.subtitle: Number of females resident per square kilometre
Population density - Female.longDescription: This indicator shows the number of usual female residents per square kilometre, calculated based on total land area excluding inland water, in the United Kingdom, for 1991 to 2024.
Population density - Female.caveats:
[Standard Area Measurements (December 2024) in the UK](https://geoportal.statistics.gov.uk/datasets/ons::standard-area-measurements-for-the-local-authority-districts-december-2024-in-the-united-kingdom/about) was used to calculate population density by dividing the female population by the area in square kilometres.

Population estimates in Explore Local Statistics (ELS) are informed by those available on Nomis at the time of publication on ELS.

Population density - Male.label: Male population density
Population density - Male.subtitle: Number of males resident per square kilometre
Population density - Male.longDescription: This indicator shows the number of usual male residents per square kilometre, calculated based on total land area excluding inland water, in the United Kingdom, for 1991 to 2024.
Population density - Male.caveats:
[Standard Area Measurements (December 2024) in the UK](https://geoportal.statistics.gov.uk/datasets/ons::standard-area-measurements-for-the-local-authority-districts-december-2024-in-the-united-kingdom/about) was used to calculate population density by dividing the male population by the area in square kilometres.

Population estimates in Explore Local Statistics (ELS) are informed by those available on Nomis at the time of publication on ELS.

5-year population change.label: Five-year population change
5-year population change.subtitle: Percentage growth or decline over a five-year period

5-year population change.caveats: Population estimates in Explore Local Statistics (ELS) are informed by those available on Nomis at the time of publication on ELS.
